game.explanation: DIFFICULTY: {digit} Digit. Please enter a {digit} digit number with unique digits.
how-to-play.message1: In this enjoyable and exploring adventure your mission is to guess this number.
how-to-play.message2: While you guess blindly Caesar will guide you to wisdom.
how-to-play.message3: With every guess you will know how many of your digit is correctly placed or misplaced
